verses.verse: וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> now if זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> [be] a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offering קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <S%H7133><s%> And if his oblation אִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> if מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> [it] of the herd ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַקְרִ֔יב <S%H7126><s%> if he offer אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether זָכָר֙ <S%H2145><s%> whether [it be] a male אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or נְקֵבָ֔ה <S%H5347><s%> or female תָּמִ֥ים <S%H8549><s%> it without blemish יַקְרִיבֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7126><s%> he shall offer לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <S%H5564><s%> And he shall lay יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <S%H7133><s%> of his offering וּשְׁחָט֕וֹ <S%H7819><s%> and kill פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> it [at] the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְזָרְק֡וּ <S%H2236><s%> shall sprinkle בְּנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְהִקְרִיב֙ <S%H7126><s%> And he shall offer מִזֶּ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֔ים <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> that covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֶּ֔רֶב <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <S%H7130><s%> that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲלֵהֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <S%H3689><s%> that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> above the liver עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַכְּלָי֖וֹת <S%H3629><s%> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5493><s%> it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨ירוּ <S%H6999><s%> shall burn אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> And Aaron's הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> it on the altar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> upon the burnt sacrifice אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> which [is] upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הָאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> that [is] on the fire אִשֵּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> [it is] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ
